description: Conversation where the user adds a VIP guest list for a charity gala and EventPlannerPro creates RSVP entries and sends personalized invitation emails to each VIP.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can synchronize venue calendars, manage vendor contracts, track RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.

I need to add my VIP guest list for the upcoming charity gala on June 15, 2025 (event ID: gala_2025) and send each of them a personalized invitation email. The guests are:
1. Alexandra Chen – alex.chen@example.com
2. Miguel Torres – miguel.torres@example.com
3. Priya Singh – priya.singh@example.com
Got it! I’ll add each VIP to the RSVP list for *gala_2025* and then send a personalized invitation email to each of them.

arguments.subject: You’re Invited: Charity Gala – June 15, 2025
arguments.body:
Dear {{name}},

We are delighted to invite you to our Charity Gala on June 15, 2025 at the Grand Ballroom. Your presence will make a huge difference!

Please let us know if you can attend by confirming your RSVP.

Best regards,
EventPlannerPro Team

messages.content: All three VIP guests have been added to the RSVP list for *gala_2025*, and personalized invitation emails have been sent to Alexandra, Miguel, and Priya. Let me know if you need anything else – for example, tracking their responses, updating the event timeline, or handling venue bookings.
